hu_HU {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: AmPmMarkers */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "Ft",
            "HUF ",
            ",",
    }
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "HH.mm.ss",
            "HH.mm.ss",
            "HH.mm.ss",
            "HH.mm.ss",
            "yyyy. MMM. dd., EEEE,  z",
            "yyyy. MMM. dd., EEEE, HH.mm.ss z",
            "yyyy-MMMM-dd",
            "yyyy-MMMM-dd",
            "{1} {0}",
    }
    DayAbbreviations { 
            "v",
            "h",
            "k",
            "sze",
            "cs",
            "p",
            "szo",
    }
    DayNames { 
            "vas\u00E1rnap",
            "h\u00E9tf\u0151",
            "kedd",
            "szerda",
            "cs\u00FCt\u00F6rt\u00F6k",
            "p\u00E9ntek",
            "szombat",
    }

        Title { "Hungarian locale for Hungary" }
        Source { "RAP" }
        Address { "Sankt Jorgens Alle 8, DK-1615 Kobenhavn V, Danmark" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Hungarian" }
        Territory { "Hungary" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "4.7" }
        Date { "2001-01-29" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[IiYy].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    MonthAbbreviations { 
            "jan",
            "feb",
            "m\u00E1r",
            "\u00E1pr",
            "m\u00E1j",
            "j\u00FAn",
            "j\u00FAl",
            "aug",

            "augusztus",
            "szeptember",

            "november",
            "december",
            "",
    }

        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "" }

            ".",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",

            "E",
            "\u2030",

            "\uFFFD",

            "#,##0%",
    }
    PaperSize { 
        Hieght { "297" }
